original_text: Peter was there with the other 11 apostles and he stood up with them. He began to speak to the crowd with a loud voice. He said, ‘You people who are Jews like us, listen carefully to me. All of you who live here in Jerusalem, you also listen to me. I will explain to you everything that is happening.
korean_text: 베드로가 열한 사도와 함께 서서 소리를 높여 이르되 유대인들과 예루살렘에 사는 모든 사람들아 이 일을 너희로 알게 할 것이니 내 말에 귀를 기울이라

sentences.original_text: Peter was there with the other 11 apostles
sentences.korean_translation: 베드로는 다른 11명의 사도들과 함께 그곳에 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and he stood up with them
He began to speak to the crowd
You people who are Jews like us
All of you who live here in Jerusalem
I will explain to you everything
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 여러분에게 모든 것을 설명할 것입니다
